akn:section.akn:heading: Management of intellectual property matters within the Department of Defense

akn:content.akn:p: (a) The Secretary of Defense, acting through the Under Secretary of Defense for Acquisition and Sustainment, shall develop policy on the acquisition or licensing of intellectual property—
(b) For a provision requiring establishment of a cadre of personnel who are experts in intellectual property matters, see section 1707 of this title.
